titleStmt.title: A view of the differences between France and Spain in which is shown the present posture of the affaires of Europe· English't by a person of honour.
Judicious vievv of the businesses which are at this time between France and the house of Austria.
titleStmt.author: Person of honour.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for H. Herringman, and sold by Jos. Knight, and Far. Saunders, at the Blew Anchor in the Lower-Walk of the New-Exchange,

notesStmt.note: A reissue of "A judicious vievv of the businesses which are at this time between France and the house of Austria.", first published in 1657, with a new title page.
Reproduction of the original in the Congregational Library, London.

place.placeName: the Blew Anchor in the Lower-Walk of the New-Exchange
